alert.note: Alert for Marion (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 13 at 6:25PM CDT until May 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Tornado Warning for... West central Marion County in south central Iowa... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 624 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located near Pleasantville, or 9 miles west of Knoxville, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Pleasantville. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
